summary:
DAMP is a basic edit which can replace Tamriel's days & months with their Gregorian equivalents.

Various versions are available on the downloads folder, including the option to use both Tamriel and our own world's days & months at the same time. This is especially useful if, like me, you want to keep the flavour of Skyrim, but
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]D.A.M.P. - Days and Months Plus[/size]
A simple mod, for simple people[size=1] (like me!)
[/size][/center]

[center][size=3]DAMP is a basic edit which can replace Tamriel's days & months with their Gregorian equivalents.

Various versions are available on the downloads folder, including the option to use both Tamriel and our own world's days & months at the same time. This is especially useful if, like me, you want to keep the flavour of Skyrim, but struggle to remember which month is which.[/size]
[/center]
author: Illiani
